name: Lonely Afternoons
description:
Long after his expulsion from school in Japan, 17 year old Takea joins the bizarre St Citrum's high school,  A private academy hidden in a sleepy European village.

His arrival is timed three days prior to the school's Halloween dance. The biggest event of the year, that always turns the school on its head. Surrounded by a cast of eccentric classmates, Takea must navigate his way through the hectic excitement until the night of the dance. Each choice you make will affect your ending.

Will you fit in?

Who will you befriend?

Will you manage to get a date in just three days?

Play to find out!
